Job Posting:171423 - Position: F25 Data Analyst Student, Fall 2025 171423 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 07/30/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 07/16/2025 11:31 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Irving Shipbuilding Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Data Analyst Student, Fall 2025 171423 Co-op Position Saint John, NB Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Data Analyst Student, Fall 2025 Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At J.D. Irving, Limited, our Transportation and Logistics team works with a powerful group of unique and successful businesses in the marine, railway, and trucking sectors. As a recognized leader in freight movement and logistics services, we are the destination of choice for curious, energetic, and collaborative people. We hire high-energy, motivated student leaders for our Careers in Motion program that allows them to gain knowledge across our various business units. We invest in continuous professional growth through strong career development programs, while providing an opportunity for students to leave their mark on a growing company. Join us and work among the best in the Maritimes! Responsibilities • Explore and characterize data available to business units/teams • Develop and implement predictive and descriptive models • Serve as a data and/or analytic resource for initiative-based teams Provide support to the diverse companies throughout the Transportation and Logistics division • About the Team Universal Truck and Trailer is Atlantic Canada's largest heavy-duty truck dealership featuring the most up-to-date dealer service bays in Southern New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island. We are an authorized sales, service, parts and warranty dealership for premium products Freightliner and Western Star Trucks. In addition, we service most makes and models for class 6, 7, and 8 vehicles, including luxury class RVs. We focus on exceeding customer requirements through continuously developing our team and building technical capabilities. About Us Founded in 1882, J.D. Irving, Limited (JDI) has operations in Canada and the United States and are a team of 20,000 dedicated employees. At J.D. Irving, Limited, you are part of a dynamic team of professionals who lead with integrity and are passionate about delivering results. With a culture that nurtures talent and creates an inclusive workplace, you can grow your career across our various operating divisions. We are committed to creating accessible environments for our colleagues, candidates, and customers. Requests for accommodation due to a disability (which may be visible or invisible, temporary, or permanent) can be made at any stage of application and employment. We encourage candidates to make their accommodation needs known so that we can provide equitable opportunities. Worried you do not meet all the requirements? Studies have shown that many applicants apply only to job opportunities when they feel they meet 100% of the criteria. We promote an inclusive environment where everyone is appreciated, recognized, and empowered to contribute fully. If you are interested in this position but are worried you did not meet all the requirements, we would encourage you to still apply. We appreciate your interest in our company however only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted. Job Requirements Qualifications • Currently enrolled in a Computer Science, Engineering or Mathematics undergraduate degree program • In positive academic standing • Exceptional communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills • Experience working with Tableau and other data visualization tools such as: SPSS, Alteryx, or PowerBI, Python / or R would be considered an asset Attention to detail, ownership and willingness to seek and take on challenges • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careers.jdirving.com/#en/sites/Careers/job/4643/?mode=location Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
